citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:15 PM on 9-23-21.
I called the listed contact number and waited for 30 minutes in attempts to reach the licensee. All attempts were
unsuccessful.
End Section
